com.facebook.litho.widget

Interface ViewportInfo

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HasStickyHeader, LayoutInfo
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridLayoutInfo, LinearLayoutInfo, RecyclerBinder, StaggeredGridLayoutInfo

    public interface ViewportInfo
    An implementation of this interface will provide both the androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView's current visible views position and the total number of items in its androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ViewportInfo.State 
      static interface  ViewportInfo.ViewportChanged
      Implement this interface to be notified of Viewport changes from the Binder

    • Method Detail

      • findFirstVisibleItemPosition

        int findFirstVisibleItemPosition()
        Returns:
        the adapter position of the first visible view.

      • findLastVisibleItemPosition

        int findLastVisibleItemPosition()
        Returns:
        the adapter position of the last visible view.

      • findFirstFullyVisibleItemPosition

        int findFirstFullyVisibleItemPosition()
        Returns:
        the adapter position of the first fully visible view.

      • findLastFullyVisibleItemPosition

        int findLastFullyVisibleItemPosition()
        Returns:
        the adapter position of the last fully visible view.

      • getItemCount

        int getItemCount()
        Returns:
        total number of items in the adapter
